name: Brass Dragon Wyrmling
senses: Blindsight 10 ft., Darkvision 60 ft.,  Passive Perception 14

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Breath Weapons
actions.description: The dragon uses one of the following breath weapons.

actions.name: Fire Breath
actions.description: The dragon exhales fire in an 20-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Sleep Breath
actions.description: The dragon exhales sleep gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or fall unconscious for 1 minute. This effect ends for a creature if the creature takes damage or someone uses an action to wake it.
